# iru_licensing (Data Source)

Get detailed Iru tenant licensing information, including the total number of licensed slots and the current device utilization across platforms.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_licensing" "example" {}

output "tenant_status" {
  value = data.iru_licensing.example.tenant_over_license_limit
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `computers_count` (Number)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ios_count` (Number)
- `ipados_count` (Number)
- `macos_count` (Number)
- `max_devices` (Number)
- `tenant_over_license_limit` (Boolean)
- `tvos_count` (Number)
